ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: Demonstrates easy Xaml Styling via the ThemeManager. SciChart includes six pre-defined Themes, which provide chart pane, grid-line brushes and default colors for Renderable Series
ExampleDefinition.Description:
SciChart Ships with 8 stunning themes, which you can apply to your charts with a single line of code.
This example shows how to style SciChart with your own custom theme, and how it affects default cursor, zoom, axis, grid and series colors.
[b][i]Tips![/i][/b]
To define your custom theme you need to create a ResourceDictionary with the brushes and colors which are all keyed off the properties in the IThemeProvider interface.
You can also take one of our themes and just [url='http://www.scichart.com/questions/question/example-for-implementing-ithemeprovider']override certain brushes or colors[/url].
